allow: Bash(powershell -Command "Get-ChildItem -Path src\pages -Recurse -Include *.tsx,*.ts | ForEach-Object { (Get-Content $_FullName) -replace ''import \{ Link \} from ""react-router-dom"";'', ''""use client"";^n^nimport Link from ""next/link"";'' | Set-Content $_FullName }")
Bash(for file in useAuth.tsx useUserRole.tsx use-mobile.tsx)
